name: Soulless Revenge
description:
Made for the Blackthornprod #3 Game Jam.

One odd creature from the underworld regularly visits a nearby graveyard to steal its power. One day, the creature decided to go to the graveyard again to harvest the power it withholds. The soulless people in the graves planned to eliminate the hideous creature once and for all. They wanted revenge, soulless revenge.

Tip: Destroy graves to make the game easier.
